title: The 4 most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dream of reconciliation in a dream

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of peace in a dream: Reconciliation between people in general is a praiseworthy matter, encouraged by the Islamic religion, and encouraged by laws and rulings, because of its effects on the cohesion of society, achieving happiness in this world and the hereafter, and reconciliation between his saying. : Shall I tell you that it is better than fasting, prayer and charity? They said: Yes, he said: Reconciliation. Peace in a dream Reconciliation in a dream can mean many meanings, it basically changes from one situation to another, from strife, alienation and distance to friendship, love and closeness, and in this there is everything that is good as a result of the cessation of hostility and closeness. Of harmony between people in life. Reconciliation can indicate an increase in status in a dream, an abundance of goods on the road, or the return of a relationship between married or divorced people. The sleeper can see many situations revolving around peace and reconciliation between people and be confused about the message it conveys. Seeing him, but the interpretation of reconciliation in a dream varies depending on the circumstances of the owner. For the vision and according to what he sees, the details and people are in the same vision. Therefore, the matter is subject to a number of factors that we try to simplify in the following lines. In most cases, the interpretation of a dream about peace is good news, bringing its owner to agree with others, which increases his relationship in life, and facilitates his affairs, according to the Almighty’s saying: “And peace is good.” An-Nisa’ 128) to end the distress according to the Almighty’s saying: (If they repent and reconcile, then turn away from them. Indeed, God is Forgiving, Most Merciful) (An-Nisa’ 16). What is the interpretation of a dream about reconciliation between quarreling spouses? If the dreamer sees himself reconciling between two quarreling spouses, this may indicate the great wisdom that God gave it to him and a number of people who turn to him with their problems. If he sees himself fixing his wife and they do not quarrel, then this is a lot of sustenance and a gift from God to him on the way to him. Therefore, reconciliation means getting closer to God. If the dreamer sees herself reconciling with her husband, this indicates the satisfaction of God and His angels with her, and justice in her affairs and the arrangement of her children, and if she reconciles with him in reality, then they are the opposite, then it indicates the removal of a temptation that almost befalls them, but it She learned that her husband was corrupt in his religion or morals, and she saw that she had reconciled with him, then this indicates that she may fall upon her household. If the dreamer sees that he is reconciling the quarreling spouses, then the dream’s interpretation of reconciliation between the quarreling spouses indicates good news for the dreamer and peace for himself after a long dispute. Reconciliation between spouses restores a house divided by strife and strife, as if he sees himself in them, as if the matter that has occupied him for a long time and made him hesitate will end well, God willing. If he knows the quarreling couple that he saw in a dream, and they were in reality at odds, this means that he will reconcile between them, God willing. If they are not in opposition, it means that there will be a quarrel between this couple. Because Ibn Shirin said in his interpretation of disagreement that disagreement is reconciliation. If the person who sees reconciliation between spouses is famous for his kindness and good morals, then he will reconcile with each other if the spouses quarrel, but he is known for his hatred and hatred.

title: I dreamed that my cousin was killed in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that my cousin was killed in a dream. All this and more details that interest you..I dreamed that my cousin was killed in a dream. I dreamed that my cousin was killed in a dream. In a dream, it may be a sign of the cousin’s advanced age, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a dead person in a dream, this may indicate psychological pressures, and God knows the unseen. Seeing someone being killed in a dream can also represent age, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing someone being killed in a dream can express The pressures he is exposed to, and God knows all that is unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the death of his cousin in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a cousin in a dream may indicate the enemies of the dreamer and he should be careful, and God knows best. If a married woman sees the death of her cousin, it may be transmitted to the enemies around her, and God knows best. I know everything that is not seen. Also, seeing the breast of an unmarried girl’s mother’s son may indicate that she She is thinking about a connection with her cousin, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing praying behind the imam in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women

preview.html:
Interpretation of dreams to see praying behind the imam in a dream for single, married and pregnant women. Prayer is one of the duties of Islam and is one of the pillars of Islam. God Almighty has forbidden abandoning prayer because it distinguishes between an infidel and a Muslim and that prayer prevents immorality and evil and brings the servant closer. For his master. It is a means by which the servant communicates with God Almighty, asks for forgiveness, and listens when he commits a sin. Therefore, when someone sees that he is praying behind an imam, this dream arouses the dreamer’s curiosity and he begins to search for a meaning and interpretation of this dream in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women. Interpretation of the dream of seeing prayer Behind the imam in a dream: Dreaming about praying behind the imam is a good dream for interpretation. Whoever sees in a dream that he is praying behind the imam, his vision indicates that he is walking on the path of truth, is accompanied by good company, and desires to receive knowledge from righteous teachers, as well as his commitment to the Sunnah of the Prophet. the Prophet. Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him. Also, the priest who prays behind the imam in a dream shows that he is able to distinguish between truth and falsehood, and that he is always ready to know the truth, and he is also characterized by the breadth of his mind. Another interpretation of this vision is that it indicates that the dreamer is persistent in his prayers on earth and that God Almighty It facilitates his affairs, improves his condition, and achieves what he wants on the ground. And if the fortuneteller is married. Seeing it bodes well. Whoever sees in his dream that he is praying behind a dream in his house, then this vision was good news that his need will be met and his desire will be satisfied. If the imam wears white clothes in the dream of an unmarried young man, this indicates that the dreamer will marry a girl of ancient origin. The dream of praying behind the imam Without hearing his voice, it indicates that the term is approaching, and God is higher and knows the times. This vision may indicate that God Almighty will grant the viewer joy, happiness, and goodness. But if a person sees in his dream that he is praying next to the imam and not behind him, then the dream portends him a high status and position and a change in his circumstances to The best, both at work and at work.
ZOE. Among the warning dreams is the dream of praying behind the imam sitting, as well as the worshipers sitting behind him. This dream means that the people of that place may suffer from poverty and affliction. Interpretation of a dream about seeing praying behind the imam in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream praying behind the imam indicates the calm and stability of the dreamer’s circumstances. This vision also indicates the dreamer’s commitment to performing the commanded acts of worship. Accordingly. If a single girl prays in a dream behind the imam, this means that she will achieve the goals that she seeks to achieve in reality. If the imam behind whom an unmarried woman prays is wearing white clothes, then the dream is good news for her upcoming marriage. And if his clothes are green, this is evidence However, God Almighty will grant the dreamer happiness and stability in her life. As for the imam who wore black clothes in an unmarried woman’s dream and his appearance was frightening, this indicates that the dreamer will face obstacles in her life, and if she gets engaged, her engagement will not be complete. Interpretation of the dream of seeing praying behind the imam in a dream for a married woman: A married woman dreamed that she was arriving

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about escaping from Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream: Escape: Escape is actually staying away from any person or thing that causes us physical or psychological harm. We are often running from thieves, the police, or even ourselves. In the world of dreams, the person who sees escaping in a dream is in a hurry to search for what this dream is and you know its various meanings, and whether it is praiseworthy or not, so in the article we will explain to you many legal sayings on this subject. Interpretation of the dream of escaping: escaping in a dream has many Interpretations that vary depending on the individual’s condition and this can be clarified through the following: In interpreting the dream of a married woman escaping from her partner, Miller says that she cannot obtain her rights and there is a danger to her reputation. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she will leave with her lover, this is a sign On the other hand, she will be exposed to shocks and loss of hope. A person who dreams that his girlfriend left with another person or vice versa shows deception and insincerity in love. When a person sees in a dream leaving a registered dangerous person, this means that he is a person who keeps secrets, but this makes him vulnerable to harm and damage. Escaping from a window in a dream leads to facing many challenges and dilemmas in life, and in the case of escaping from prison, this indicates the possibility of working in more than one place. Still not finding what you are looking for? Log in from Google to the dream interpretation site on the Internet and see everything that interests you. Interpretation of the dream of escaping by Ibn Sirin. Learn with us about the various clues that Muhammad Ibn Sirin said in the dream of escaping: Escape in a dream means that the dreamer will gain safety, care, and reassurance after a difficult period in his life that made him feel anxious and distressed. To dream that you are escaping means providing assistance to those who need it and staying away from problems and actions that cause harm. Escaping during sleep indicates the state of anxiety and fear that the dreamer is experiencing, his insecurity, and his inability to predict what will happen in the coming days. The person who dreams that he is escaping from death This is a sign of his death, and if he is running away from the enemy, this is a sign of his ability to escape from the evil and harm that people inflict on him, but if the enemy is in a position that allows him to harm him, this leads him to great trouble and a bad psychological state. Whoever commits a forbidden act, becomes angry. On his Lord. If he sees him running in a dream, this indicates that he is unrighteous, has corrupt intentions, and hates others. If he feels fear while running away in a dream, this is a sign of the hardship that the dreamer is suffering from, which disrupts his life and makes him fail. Interpretation of a dream about escaping for a single woman. The meanings of escaping differed in A dream for a single woman, so we explain this as follows: Escaping in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she wants to change her life and get rid of the past that caused her a lot of fatigue and harm. The dream of escaping also shows a girl’s courage and ability to control the affairs of her life. Escaping from a specific person in A person's life indicates that she heard important news and was able to get rid of all the things that caused her fear and exhaustion. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that if a girl dreams that she

title: Seeing rain in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: There is no doubt that seeing rain in a dream is a happy dream, because rain carries a sign of goodness and blessing for the dreamer, but the interpretation of rain is like other dreams and visions that are interpreted through what came in the dream. And through the viewer, a man, a woman, or a single woman, and through the following we will explain all of this, so stay with us. Seeing rain in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees in her dream, it is raining. This may be an indication of her prosperity because it shows that she has a great deal of Stability and satisfaction in her married life. When Raya got married under the rain of her sleep. It can provide evidence that she will be able to obtain everything she aspires to, and indicates that her desires will soon come true. When a married woman sees heavy rain in her dream. In the good news that she will become pregnant After a long period of waiting. When a married woman sees rain in her dream. This may indicate that she feels joy and happiness in her life with her children. When a married woman sees rain in her dream. This is an indication that her circumstances are changing for the better, as it shows that God will bestow upon her A lot of his grace. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is walking on the road and the rain falls and she is happy about it. This may mean that she will live a happy married life with her husband. When a married woman sees more rain in her dream. This may mean that he will have more money soon If a married woman sees in her dream that she is watching her children playing in the rain and they are enjoying it. This may indicate that her children will reach a great position in the future, God willing. When a married woman sees rain in her dream, this may mean that she will hear a lot of good news and occasions. Happy is good news. It also appears that she will end all the burdens that were on her shoulders. When a married woman sees rain in her dream. This may indicate that happiness will prevail in the dreamer’s house, as it indicates that there will be no crises or intractable issues, God willing. When a woman sees If a married woman dreams that she is walking with her husband in the rain, this may indicate that her circumstances will change for the better. Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is walking with her husband in the rain, this may indicate Indicating that she will soon become pregnant after a long wait. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is bathing in the rain, this is good news for sincere repentance, as it indicates that she will stay away from wrong decisions. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is walking under a light rain, it is good that she will get rid of The pressures and fears that she was suffering from. When a married woman sees that she is walking in the rain, this indicates hard work and pursuit of the needs and requirements of her home, with the aim of securing her condition from future dangers. If a married woman sees that she is walking in the rain while she is already pregnant, this is good news that she will give birth. The baby she wants. If a married woman sees that she is walking in the rain while she is already pregnant, this is good news that she will give birth. The baby she wants. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is walking in the rain, this may mean that she is getting rid of her...

title: Interpretation of snow in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: The interpretation of snow in a dream is one of the most important things that those who have these visions search for, because they are ambiguous visions and have no specific meaning. The interpretation of a dream about snow varies according to the dreamer’s condition in it and the details of the dream itself.. The dream. Interpretation of snow in a dream for different occasions. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing snow in a dreamFrom Ibn Sirin’s point of view: Seeing snow in a dream indicates calm, tranquility and kindness. Whoever sees that the snow is melting is a warning to lose His money. If a person dreams that he is walking in snow on his way, then this dream indicates that he will face difficulties in achieving what he desires. When a person sees that snow has fallen and accumulated on the road, this is good news for the coming of a year full of goodness and blessings. An expatriate sees snow falling during His sleep symbolizes his safe return to his country. Whoever sees heavy snowfall and illness, his dream indicates that he will recover soon. A student who sees snow falling means that he will succeed and excel. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of a dream about snowIbn Shaheen says that snow in a patient’s dream indicates his recovery from His illness and achieving peace and tranquility in his life. Whoever sees a large amount of snow falling, his vision indicates that he will hear good news soon and that he will achieve his desires and goals. Seeing snow falling in winter indicates an answer to prayers and salvation from problems and worries. If one sees that there is falling If one sees that he is walking on the snow with difficulty, this means that he will encounter many Difficulties in his life and he will not be able to make money, and this may indicate that the dreamer is facing psychological problems. Whoever eats snow in his dream means that he will get a lot of money without fatigue or trouble. A prisoner who sees snow falling on him means that he will soon be released from prison. If a person sees that snow is falling heavily while he is an expatriate, this is good news for his return to his homeland. Seeing snow surrounding the house from all sides and impeding movement indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many problems but will overcome them easily. Interpretation of a single woman’s dream of snowIf an unmarried woman sees snow falling Abundantly, this is a sign of stability in her life. Whoever sees that he is eating snow, his vision indicates that he will spend his money on useless things. An unmarried woman who sees snow falling from the sky and hindering her movement indicates that she will face many problems in her life. Seeing her playing Snow rollers show that she is suffering from a psychological disorder. Interpretation of a married woman seeing snow in a dream: If a married woman dreams that she is playing with snow, this is a sign that she will enjoy her life free of trouble. And if she dreams that snow is falling without causing her a problem, then her dream indicates a lot of Good things will come to her and her family. Seeing a married woman accumulating snow in her house indicates an accumulation of responsibilities and many fears.

title: Interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream via the website roy2a.com, a basin in a dream is one of the amazing and astonishing visions. When the dreamer sees a basin in a dream, he begins to wonder what this vision means and what it appears, and today, through this article, we will present to you the interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream, according to great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other scholars of dream interpretation. Follow us according to the status of the fortuneteller, whether he is male or single. Or married. Interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream shows that the coming period of the dreamer’s life will be full of comfort, stability, and happiness. Seeing in a dream someone washing from a basin indicates that God will alleviate distress and remove the dreamer’s worries. The bathtub is full of money in the dream, which is It indicates that the dreamer will be promoted to an important position in his work, and God knows best. Drinking from the sink in a dream. It indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness and sustenance in his life. A hole in the sink in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer has suffered heavy losses in his life, and God knows best. Seeing a broken sink. In a dream, it indicates many conflicts and crises in the dreamer’s life during the coming period. Emptying the basin in a dream indicates that the dreamer is going through a bad psychological state and feels lonely and sad. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing the stomach in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the basin in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the vision of washing from the basin in a dream. It indicates The dreamer is a good person and close to God. Drinking water from a basin in a dream indicates that promising things will happen in the dreamer’s practical life. A basin in a dream shows that the viewer is trying in his life to achieve great success. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing pressure in the abdomen in a dream. Interpretation Seeing a bathtub in a dream for a single woman. Bathing in a bathtub in a dream for a single woman indicates that there are many young men asking her to marry her. Bathing in a bathtub in a dream for a single woman, which indicates that she will achieve all her ambitions and goals in life soon, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried woman in a bathtub Full of water in a dream. This indicates that she will marry someone who suits her and has many good qualities. Broken basin in a fiancée’s dream, which indicates that there are some disputes between her and her fiancé, which may lead to separation. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a shower in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream for a married woman. A fish tank for a married woman in a dream shows that she is living a happy and stable married life. A tank full of water in a dream for a married woman, and this indicates that she will have many children, and God knows best. A hole in the tank in a dream for a married woman, which says that her husband is going through a difficult period full of problems and crises. Interpretation of seeing a tank in a dream for a pregnant woman. A vision A basin in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will undergo an easy and affordable birth. A basin is full of water in a dream for a pregnant woman. It indicates that she will give birth to a child who will be good and will be very happy with him. A solution from a basin in a dream for a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of seeing eating apples in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing apples in a dream. Scientists have interpreted seeing red apples in a dream to indicate the intractable and forbidden desires of the dreamer. Seeing colorful apples in a dream shows that the dreamer is living a life of calm and peace. An apple in a dream is a symbol of wisdom, logic, and reason. Seeing ripe apples in a dream indicates stability, stability, and the pursuit of desires. And loyalty, and it can be a sign of victory or progress. Seeing yellow apples in a dream indicates excessive fatigue, especially if they are eaten at an inappropriate time. Seeing rotten apples in a dream is a bad omen for the dreamer, as it indicates the deterioration of the marital relationship as a result of misconduct by the dreamer or someone. Relatives. Seeing rotten apples could be a sign of losing business or participating in an illegal business and benefiting from it. Interpretation of seeing apples for a single woman. An unmarried woman sees apples in a dream. This dream has many interpretations. As for the one who eats fresh red apples in a dream, this indicates satisfaction. Her desires and the achievement of her goals. The red apple of the song indicates his emotional state and that he is going through a stage of love and passion, and the red apple can indicate jealousy. The yellow apple of an unmarried woman indicates illicit ambitions and intentions that are not innocent. Whoever sees in a dream that he is cooking apples in a dream, then this The dream is a good omen for the dreamer, and this indicates that he hears good news, and good news for her. Interpretation of seeing apples for a married woman: A married woman buys apples from the market, this dream foretells her an improvement in her financial condition and an abundant living. Seeing apples in season in a dream is a good thing for their owner in the dream. Whoever dreams that she is feeding her husband apples, then this dream is most likely a sign of an imminent pregnancy. Whoever sees in a dream that he is washing apples and removing dirt from the attic, this dream indicates the death of the negative thoughts that surround him and that haunt him. Whoever sees in a dream that he is distributing apples to Guests or taking them from a dead person, this dream deserves praise for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing apples for a pregnant woman. Seeing apples for a pregnant woman varies in interpretation according to color, number and taste, and the number of apples in a dream indicates the number of feelings or remaining weeks of pregnancy, and seeing delicious red apples in a dream It means that the baby is feminine and with good taste. Apples indicate easy birth without fatigue or discomfort. Therefore, we have explained to you all possible interpretations about seeing apples in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the bottom of the signed article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible maybe.

title: Interpretation of seeing thirst in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing thirst: Summer is one of the seasons in which the temperature rises and the humidity increases significantly, and therefore the person needs to drink large amounts of water, to quench the thirst that may bother him in the summer, and the person feels very thirsty while fasting. For long hours without drinking water, he can be patient and needs large quantities of water, as water is very beneficial for the body and must be drunk in the quantities necessary for the body every day. Interpretation of a dream about seeing thirstThirst is one of the natural things that we can be exposed to, as a result of our many daily efforts and great effort, while The interpretation of the dream to quench thirst came with these different connotations of the Lord: It was stated in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation that thirst is one of the signs of the ogre after distress. Many connotations of thirst in a dream indicate the dreamer’s desire to marry, whether it is a girl or a boy. It should be noted that thirst comes from Longing for someone. While an unmarried woman who dreams of thirst shows tired feelings due to a failed romantic relationship. Seeing an unmarried woman quenching her thirst indicates good and human things with the happiness that awaits her. Also, seeing thirst in a dream is one of the signs that indicates that A single woman is afraid of something in her life. But seeing it in a married woman’s dream is a sign of marital problems. It is worth noting that a married woman’s thirst is evidence of her husband’s financial crisis. A pregnant woman’s dream of being thirsty is a sign that she will be blessed with a male child, and God knows best. Likewise, thirst The pregnant woman is quenched with water, which indicates her nourishment with the child. While thirst for the man is a sign of his marriage to a righteous woman, so he feels happy with her. See also: Interpretation of dreams about failing in exams The dream and its meaning Interpretation of a dream about seeing dry saliva Many of us may see many different dreams, a person may feel that they are It may bring him promising signs, and among these dreams is the dream of dry saliva, as it came to the dreamer with many people, to name a few. : -It can be considered a sign of crises and difficulties that God will face. It is also a sign that the viewer is exposed to poverty and financial crises. While it appears dry mouth, it is a sign of clenched hands, which means that the condition is physically tight. It is also a sign that insight will not complete things Which he is planning. While the fortuneteller saw that his body was suffering from dehydration, Ibn Sirin interpreted it as a sign of trouble that would arise in his house. It was stated in the commentators’ interpretation that dry saliva in a dream is considered one of the bad dreams in its humanity for the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Graves, cemeteries, or cemeteries in detail in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a dry face in a dream. In winter, we feel dryness of the face and usually need constant hydration, which is the best way to maintain it, while... dreaming of a dry face in a dream, and commentators have interpreted it with the following interpretations: It is one of the signs that indicates It indicates the bad conditions of the person in his life, and God knows best. It is also a sign of the difficulties and problems that he will face

title: Learn about the dream interpretation of the name Muhammad

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the name Muhammad Muhammad is the name of the Messenger of God, and many believe that the name Muhammad in a dream is one of the good visions that portend goodness and remove distress, because of its great importance in the souls of all Muslims. In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of the name Muhammad in a dream and its meaning according to the state of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about the name MuhammadThis dream is considered one of the visions with beloved connotations, due to the blessing from the owner of this name, the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. If the dreamer is sick, then this dream is news that he will recover. Of his illness. This dream is one of the warning visions in the case of one who commits sins. It is a warning and a warning to get rid of those sins and disobedience and stay away from them. Interpretation of a dream about the name Muhammad by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that Muhammad’s visit to the pioneer indicates his almost unhappiness if the dreamer is suffering from an illness and if he sees That he met a person named Muhammad and did not know him in reality, then this dream indicates that he will achieve his goals for the sake of whomever he works. The name is considered good news for abundant livelihood if he sees it written in his workplace, and if he sees that he sees the name Muhammad written on the walls of his house, then this dream is a reminder of the necessity He thanked God Almighty for the blessings bestowed upon him. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the name Muhammad in a dream is good news for the one who sees happiness in religion and in the world because it is the name of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. You have a dream that confuses you, wait for it.. Google A website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Interpretation of a dream The name Muhammad is for a single woman. Seeing a girl named Muhammad in a dream means the good that that girl will receive. Interpretation of a dream about the name Muhammad for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is calling Muhammad, this is good news for her to give up her sins and repent for her sins, and announces the good life that the woman will live after she stops. About committing those sins. When a woman sees that there is a person named Muhammad approaching her, this is good news that she will live a long time and that God Almighty will bless her with her life and money. If a married woman sees herself in a dream repeating the name Muhammad, then she will become pregnant soon, in the event that she desires to become pregnant. Interpretation of a dream about the name Muhammad for a pregnant woman: This vision indicates that the pregnant woman will give birth easily and conveniently, and that she and the child she will give birth to will be in good health and will not be harmed or harmed. And if she sees that the name is written in her house, this dream indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and this dream will be good news for her by naming him Muhammad. . It is one of the best names. Interpretation of a dream about the name Muhammad for a divorced woman: This dream is considered one of the good visions as it shows that the dreamer has good qualities and may indicate that he performs praiseworthy deeds and performs deeds that help others. Although it would be a hateful dream for her to quarrel with him, it indicates That this person will persecute her, and seeing the death of a person named Muhammad in her dream may indicate that they will find her unjust. Seeing the name of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a divorced woman’s dream as if it were written in ink indicates that she is a woman of strong faith and performs many acts of worship in her life. And that it is close to God. Interpretation of a dream about the name Muhammad for a man: This dream is considered one of the visions worthy of praise. If one sees
